index_page.text.tags: Placing the announcement of the sale of goods in your native language
layout.text.logo_text: The best site of free announcements of Cyprus
index_page.text.slogan:
This private ads
and announcement of the companies on sale.
index_page.text.footer: On the Board of free announcements CBAY.COM.CY sell and buy a variety of goods. Houses and apartments, Parking lots and garages, land and villas, motorcycles and cars, household appliances and furniture, electronics, laptops and computers, cameras and phones, shoes and clothes, cats and dogs, magazines and books, bicycles, boats, villas, musical instruments and much more.
place.text.info: Before adding to the site every ad is checked for compliance with the rules

place.label.suggestion: Want to speed up the sale?
package.description.premium:
Prestige Declaration - Prestige-Declaration within 7 days displayed in a prominent place website in top pages of search results and highlighted in orange.
euro 3.99
package.description.vip:
VIP ads for 7 days are shown in a special VIP section on the search results pages. the
euro 2.99
package.description.selected:
Select ad - Dedicated ad for 7 days displayed on the search results page on a special orange background. It will rise in the search results for free.
euro 1.99
package.description.top:
To raise search - Raised ad rises to first place in search results, and remains there during the day. the
0.99 euro
advert.tooltip.name: How to address to you?
advert.tooltip.email: Your e-mail address will not be visible to other users, you will use this e-mail address to log on to the website
advert.tooltip.phone: You can enter multiple numbers separated by commas
advert.tooltip.title: Type a descriptive and detailed title to draw attention to the ad. Do not write in the name of price and contact information and do not use the word “sell”.
advert.tooltip.keywords: Enter keywords separated by commas, as precise as possible in describing Your announcement
advert.tooltip.description: Please describe Your product or service, in order to avoid unnecessary questions. Do not specify in the description, telephone, e-mail, links to websites - there are separate fields.
advert.tooltip.amount:
THIS FIELD IS REQUIRED!
establish reasonable and not overpriced, look at how much similar products. Cheap goods are sold much faster.
advert.tooltip.images: Add a good, quality pictures that will attract more attention. Hold “Ctrl” to download some photos.
captcha.label.title: Security code
menu.label.advert_finish: The ad is successfully added to the website
place.text.advert_added_info: Advertisement :advert added to the site. It will appear in search results for some time after the test moderator.
place.text.advert_added_manage: Also You can manage your ads through :entering

profile_page.adverts.title: You have not made any announcements
profile_page.adverts.what_is: On this page you can manage the ads. All Your ads will be displayed directly on the page.
profile_page.ended.title: Νο completed ads
profile_page.ended.what_is: This page displays the adds have ended the time of publication. You can extend the publication of the advertisement.
profile_page.blocked.title: No Blocked ads
messages_page.title: You have no new messages
messages_page.text.what_is: In this section will be to receive reports from site users
messages_page.inbox_text.what_is: In this section will receive messages sent to users of the website
messages_page.draft_title: You have no messages in the drafts
messages_page.darft_text.what_is: In this section will receive messages sent by You in draft
messages_page.label.title: Subject
messages_page.label.author: Author
profile_page.settings.label.name: Your name
profile_page.settings.text.password_info: Enter your current password, new password and repeat new password, to avoid typos.
profile_page.settings.text.messages_info: Mark the messages that you want to receive by e-mail
profile_page.settings.text.delete_info: If you want to delete your account and all ads, click on "proceed to delete the account."
profile_page.delete.title: Deleting a profile
profile_page.delete.text: If You click on the button "Delete my account", then Your account and all Your ads will be deleted. To restore the account and the ads will be impossible. Re-registration and submission of ads on Your current e-mail is also possible.
messages.advert.unpublish.title: Do you really want to buy ads?
messages.advert.unpublish.info: Private ads are not shown to other users. You can reopen a closed ads in your Personal Cabinet (refer to "My ads").
messages.advert.unpublish.reason_text: It is important for us to know useful site CBAY.COM.CY our users. We will be very grateful if You checked the reason for closing announcements:
messages.advert.publish.title: The announcement is activated
bookmarks.title: Что такое закладки?
bookmarks.text.what_is: Now You can save your favorite ads bookmarks. To do this on the listing page, click on the link "add to bookmarks". All selected ads will be displayed directly on the page. You can always return to it by clicking on the Bookmarks tab at the top of any page.
bookmarks.label.delete_selected: To delete the selected from bookmarks
bookmarks.text.advert.added: The announcement has been successfully added to bookmarks
profile_page.changeemail.title: Enter Your new E-mail
profile_page.changeemail.text.info:
If You really want to change the email address, enter Your new e-mail and click on "Change address".

To this address will be sent an email containing a link, clicking on which You confirm changing e-mail.
profile_page.changeemail.text.refer: The link need to confirm that your e-mail really belong to you.

register_page.label.name: Your name
register_page.rules.agree: By registering on the website, I agree to the service terms of use, as well as transmission and processing of my data in Сbay.com.cy. I confirm my legal age and responsible for placing ads.
register_page.rules.subscribe: I agree to receive informational messages
